flawed_nl_solution:
The house is 2300 sq ft and we know the non-bedroom sections take up 1000 sq ft, so that leaves 2300-1000 = <<2300-1000=13000>>13000 sq ft for the bedrooms/bathrooms
So together the bedrooms are x + 0.25x = 1.25x in size.
So x = 13000 / 1.25 = <<13000/1.25=10400>>10400 sq ft
#### 10400

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 1300, not 13000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
